verses.verse: <S%G2532>"And<s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "He who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%> "I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3686>reputation<s%> <S%G3754>of<s%> being <S%G2198>alive,<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G1096><s%> <S%G1127>Wake<s%> <S%G2532>up,<s%> and <S%G4741>keep<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3062>remain,<s%> which <S%G3739>you<s%> were <S%G3195>about<s%> to throw <S%G599>away,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2147>have<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of yours <S%G4137>perfected<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> my <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5359>Philadelphia<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "He who is <S%G40>holy,<s%> he who is <S%G228>true,<s%> he who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> he who <S%G455>opens<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> can <S%G2808>shut,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2808>shuts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G455>opens,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> you <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>command<s%> to <S%G5281>endure,<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> will <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3986>testing,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2064>is<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world,<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G2400><s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G5035>quickly!<s%> <S%G2902>Hold<s%> <S%G2902>firmly<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2983>takes<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4735>crown.<s%>

<S%G846>He<s%> who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> him a <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> from there <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> comes <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> own <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> in <S%G2994>Laodicea<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "The <S%G281>Amen,<s%> the <S%G4103>Faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>True<s%> <S%G3144>Witness,<s%> the <S%G746>Head<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G2937>creation,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

<S%G3779>So,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G5513>lukewarm,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2200>hot<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5593>cold,<s%> I <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G1692>vomit<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1510><s%> 'I am <S%G4145>rich,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have gotten <S%G4147>riches,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G3762>nothing;<s%>' <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5005>wretched<s%> <S%G2532>one,<s%> <S%G1652>miserable,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>naked;<s%>

I <S%G4823>counsel<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> to <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G4448>refined<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may become <S%G4147>rich;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>garments,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G4016>clothe<s%> <S%G2532>yourself,<s%> and that the <S%G152>shame<s%> <S%G1132>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1132>nakedness<s%> may <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G5319>revealed;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> eye <S%G2854>salve<s%> to <S%G1472>anoint<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G991>see.<s%>

As many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G5368>love,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3811>chasten.<s%> Be <S%G2206>zealous<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2925>knock.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G455>opens<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> then I will come <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G1172>dine<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

<S%G846>He<s%> who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to him to <S%G2523>sit<s%> down <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3528>overcame,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne.<s%>
